page.title: 03A Local Farmer
page.content: Mr Pearce is a Dairy Farmer in the area with 274 acres and over 100 dairy cows and some beef stock. His farm produces 9,000 litres per week, but production has reduced recently because of E.E.C. laws.His milk is sold to the local dairy at Fole. He grows 80 acres of barley and grass for feeding his stock. Mr Pearce is a Checkley Parish Councillor. The Council spends between 3 and 4 thousand pounds per year on items such as the Recreation Ground in Tean, street lighting, the local cemetery and gifts to the village Community centres. It deals with local planning applications and passes on complaints to the County Council about road repairs and grass verges.
